Rule.Name: Disable IPv6 (Manual)
Rule.Section: Disable unused network protocols and devices
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The IPv6 configuration has not been reviewed, potentially leaving unmanaged exposure.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Identify and document IPv6 status with ip -6 addr show. This is a manual audit step.

Rule.Name: Ensure wireless interfaces are disabled (Automated)
Rule.Section: Disable unused network protocols and devices
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Wireless interfaces are enabled, increasing the risk of unauthorized wireless access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable wireless interfaces with rfkill block all or by unloading wireless drivers.
Rule.Verification: rfkill list | grep -E "Wireless" | grep -q "Soft blocked: yes" && echo 0 || echo 1

Rule.Name: Ensure Bluetooth is disabled (Automated)
Rule.Section: Disable unused network protocols and devices
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The Bluetooth service is enabled, which may expose the system to unauthorized wireless connections.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable and stop the Bluetooth service if it is not required.
Rule.Correction: systemctl disable bluetooth; systemctl stop bluetooth
Rule.Verification: systemctl is-active bluetooth | grep -q "inactive" && echo 0 || echo 1
